messages.title: Investing in transport
messages.content: The content of this section talks about the candidate's focus on improvements to local roads and rail services.

messages.title: Investing in our NHS
messages.content: Discusses the candidate's commitment to the local health service and the provision of cancer treatment closer to home.

messages.title: Investing in our schools
messages.content: Mentions the candidate's efforts to maintain low class sizes, free University education, and the building of new schools.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plans to improve local roads and rail services, and introduce a new rail link.
Promises to provide local cancer treatment and better support for health services.
Focus on maintaining low class sizes, free University education, and new school buildings.
Aim to secure more powers for the Scottish Parliament.

issues.education: Promotes maintained low class sizes, free University education, and building new schools.
issues.governance: Advocates for more powers for the Scottish Parliament.
issues.health: Highlights commitment to local health service and providing cancer treatment closer to home.

leaflet.personalStatement: The leaflet includes a personal statement from the candidate addressing the voters directly, reflecting his dedication to serving the Gordon constituency.

images.caption: Images of Alex Salmond engaging in various community and political activities.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes handwritten notes that appear to be signatures.
